snippet.title: Space Ace (1984) | Full playthrough
snippet.description:
In Space Ace you play the heroic Ace who must stop the evil Commander Borf from taking over the Earth! Borf plans to reduce all of humankind to infants and take over the planet. Get it on Steam ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/240340/

Enjoy the video? Hit the 💗LIKE💖 button! It helps to support the channel!  
FULL MOVIES Playlist ► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL159dQOcLlC4oPK3tasLXDcq9si78TC8g
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Subscribe 💕 https://tinyurl.com/y4fnww7j
Channel: https://www.youtube.com/GAZArts
Twitter 💦 https://twitter.com/GAZArts

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Space Ace Description:
Space Ace is a laserdisc video game produced by Don Bluth Studios, Cinematronics and Advanced Microcomputer Systems. It was unveiled in October 1983, just four months after the Dragon's Lair game, then released in Spring 1984. Space Ace follows the adventures of the dashing hero Dexter, who prefers to be called "Ace." Ace is on a mission to stop the villainous Commander Borf, who is seeking to attack Earth with his "Infanto Ray" to render Earthlings helpless by transforming them into infants. At the start of the game, Ace is partially hit by the Infanto Ray, which transforms him into an adolescent version of himself.

Developer: Advanced Microcomputer Systems
Publisher: Cinematronics
Engine:  Unity (Re-release)
Platform: MS-DOS, Arcade, Amiga, Apple IIGS, 3DO, CD-i, Jaguar CD
Release: April 29, 1984
Mode: Single-player

#SpaceAce
